docs.lead_paragraph: THE BEAUTY PART--A lampoon on art, money and corruption by the wry humorist S. J. Perelman. Nine actors play 44 characters. Opens Wednesday at the American Place Theater. Season subscribers only.

headline.main: Arts and Leisure Guide; Opening This Week

docs.abstract: R Baker humorous comment on films in which evil seems to prevail over good and how such films cause his superego, which takes form of late actor Gary Cooper, to protest; drawing
docs.snippet: THE BEAUTY PART--A lampoon on art, money and corruption by the wry humorist S. J. Perelman. Nine actors play 44 characters. Opens Wednesday at the American Place Theater. Season subscribers only.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: REVIEWS AND OTHER DATA ON SPECIFIC PRODUCTIONS

docs.lead_paragraph: Judge R. Cooper Brown of Camden County Superior Court ruled today that the state could proceed with its plan to transfer prisoners to Ancora Psychiatric Hospital and house them there for laundry and maintenance work.

headline.main: Judge Rules State May Proceed To Move Prisoners to Ancora

docs.abstract: Camden County NJ Superior Ct Judge R Cooper Brown rules on Oct 17 that state can proceed with plan to transfer prisoners to Ancora Psychiatric Hosp from Leesburg Prison and house them there for laundry and maintenance work; 90 prisoners will be housed in dormitory on part of hosp ground no longer used for patients; controversy revd; illus (M)
docs.snippet: Judge R. Cooper Brown of Camden County Superior Court ruled today that the state could proceed with its plan to transfer prisoners to Ancora Psychiatric Hospital and house them there for laundry and maintenance work.
